Body:
example_expire = arrow.utcnow()
set_header = CookieHeaderConverter.from_cookie(ResponseCookieBuilder('boo',
    'far').set_expires(str(example_expire)).build())
self.assertEqual(('Set-Cookie',
    'boo=far; Expires={f} GMT; Secure; HttpOnly'.format(f=example_expire.
    format('ddd, DD MMM YYYY HH:MM:SS'))), set_header)
